message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this offer reflects that.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12,500.
